titleStmt.title: Three sermons preached by that learned and reuerend diuine, Doctor Eedes, sometimes dean of Worcester, for their fitnesse vnto the present time, now published by Robert Horn ...
titleStmt.author: Eedes, Richard, 1555-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold at the Golden Lyon in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in: Folger Shakespeare Library and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
The Christians admission and foundation in Gods household -- The Christians guide to a wise conuersation -- The short prosperitie of the wicked and the happy estate of the iust.
